Package hu.klenium.tetris

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.klenium.tetris.Board
  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board is a grid, it stores the fallen tetrominoes' parts. Each game has one board, this is the main display area. When a tetromino can't move down any more, it is added to the board. These parts are not moveable, the player can't control them in any ways. When a row of the board is full (ie. each cell contains a tetromino part), that row is removed, and every rows inside it are moved down by one row.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board​(int rows,
             int cols,
             BoardView view)
        Initializes a new board for a new game.
        Parameters:
        rows - Height of the board.
        cols - Width of the board.
        view - The board's view used to display it.

    • Method Detail

      • addTetromino

        public void addTetromino​(Tetromino tetromino)
        Adds a fallen tetromino's parts to the board.
        Parameters:
        tetromino - The fallen tetromino.

      • canAddTetromino

        public boolean canAddTetromino​(Tetromino tetromino,
                               int fromX,
                               int fromY)
        Checks if the tetromino in this state could be added to the board at a specificed position.
        Parameters:
        tetromino - The tetromino which will be tested.
        fromX - X coordinate where the tetromino is wanted to be added (left side).
        fromY - Y coordinate where the tetromino is wanted to be added (top side).
        Returns:
        If each cell of the board are empty which would be used by the tetromino, return true, if the tetromino can't move to the specificed position, returns false.

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()

      • removeFullRows

        public void removeFullRows()
        Called when a tetromino falls down, and so it's possible a row will be full. Full rows need to be removed from the board. If a row is removed, all other rows above it will fall down one row too.

      • updateView

        private void updateView()
        Called when the board's data is updated and need to be displayed again. Passes the needed data to the view, which will draw it.
